description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Only three defenders to protect our city from an endless horde of enemy invaders. They will stop at nothing, no weapon is off limits, in their quest to take and destroy what is ours. How long can you stand against the infinite enemy?
description.short: Only three defenders to protect our city from an endless horde of enemy invaders. They will stop at nothing, no weapon is off limits, in their quest to take and destroy what is ours. How long can you stand against the infinite enemy?
